original_text: and the sin they committed becomes known, the assembly must bring a young bull as a sin offering and present it before the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그 범한 죄를 깨달으면 회중은 수송아지를 속죄제로 드릴지니 그것을 회막 앞으로 끌어다가

sentences.original_text: and the sin they committed becomes known
the assembly must bring a young bull
sentences.korean_translation: 회중은 송아지 한 마리를 가져와야 하며

sentences.original_text: and present it before the tent of meeting
